name: Alif Wicaksana Ramadhan
title: Robotics Developer & Machine Learning Enthusiast
about: Welcome to my personal page. I am passionate about robotics, artificial intelligence, and creating futuristic solutions. I bring dedication, skill, and enthusiasm to every project I undertake, pushing the boundaries of technology.

experience.company: Intelligent Robot System Laboratory (IRoS), University of Indonesia

skills: Professional Software: Linux, ROS, PyTorch, Tensorflow, OpenCV, Flask, FastAPI, Git, Docker, CI/CD
Hardware: STM32, ESP32, AVR, Arduino, PCB Design (Eagle)

projects.name: Deep Learning Based Signal Denoising
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model combining Transformer and CNN architectures to denoise ECG signals for improved clarity and accuracy in medical analysis.

projects.name: Object Tracking using DeepSORT with Infrared Image Fusion
projects.description: Fused RGB and infrared image data for robust human tracking in varied lighting conditions, employing a Kalman filter and deep learning model for feature extraction.

projects.name: Biometric Security System using Deep Learning
projects.description: Built a biometric security web application using Siamese network for facial verification, integrated with QdrantDB for storing user embeddings.

projects.name: Omni-wheel Mobile Robot Localization and Mapping using Ultra Wide-Band (UWB)
projects.description: Created a map of gas leakage intensities using a mobile robot, utilizing neural networks for gas classification and trilateration-based UWB localization.

projects.name: Human Following Robot using Optimized Adaptive Social Force Model
projects.description: Developed a differential drive mobile robot capable of following a person by detecting and tracking human leg positions using deep learning and Kalman filter. Optimized navigation using Adaptive Social Force Model.

projects.name: Leg Detection using Lidar 2D
projects.description: Developed a tool to detect, track, and associate persons around a robot using 2D Lidar data and SSD MobilenetV3 to help navigation processes.

projects.name: Distributed Image Stitching using MPI
projects.description: Improved image stitching time by distributing workloads across several nodes using MPI as part of a High-Performance Computing course.

projects.name: Cheating Detection System
projects.description: Developed an application for cheating detection in test monitoring using Yolov3 for hand detection and MTCNN for gaze detection to determine cheating behavior.

projects.name: Mask Detection on Attendance System
projects.description: Created an attendance system with mask detection capability during the COVID-19 pandemic, utilizing LBPH for face detection, VGGNet16 for identity recognition, and Yolov5 for mask detection on Raspberry Pi 4.

projects.name: Event Detection using Acoustic Sensor
projects.description: Developed a monitoring device using microphones to detect events based on acoustic signals and CNN for feature extraction, implemented on MySQL and Laravel with an Android user interface.
